title: Weemss offers an amazing experience
name: Jeremie M.
pros:
Pros: The user interface is great, easy and fun to use. Every functionality is there from coupons to special offers. The website integration works great on every platform and its design is so great and up to date that it fit perfectly within our website. And the responsive functionality makes for such a better experience for our customers. Emails are great and we only had positive feedback about them. Allowing customers to print their tickets and then SCAN them (how amazing is that) once they arrive at the event. On the backend, we could had every information we needed a click away and the feedback presented as graphics gave us great insights about our customers and allowed us to learn about who they are and how to target them.

Weemss is also way cheaper than other companies who offer a weaker product they try to pass off as great when its really not.

So yes, Weemss does offer an amazing experience!
cons:
Cons: Well, nobody likes to pay a fee on each ticket, but unlike their competitors, Weemss only take a tiny portion of the profits and use it to create a better user experience for both us - organisers and such - but also the person buying the tickets.

So much that it makes us happy not only to pay less than we would to their competitor, but also to know that the money is used to offer a better experience to our customers.

Because we are based in France, we would have liked a more international experience. Some sentences feel badly translated from english to french, and that's something our customers notice.

We would have loved to be able to fully customize the printed ticket, which we were only able to remotely do.

title: Look no further for your ticketing needs
name: Elenko E.
pros: Pros: ease of integration, ticket flexibility, marketing automation, api / zapier abilities, uptime, swiftness
cons:
Cons: we're using the software for running races and there are a couple of things that could be added:

- donations as part of the ticket

- multi-lingual support
overall: Overall: I'm writing having 2 full years of experience using WeeMss for our organisation. This software turned to be our CRM, to be honest.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Try it, you won't regret it

title: Weemss is the system, which allows us to develop our business and organize our events professional.
name: Yoana V.
pros: Pros: The best thing in Weemss is that there are many options and settings and in that way we can customize the registration forms according to our needs. Other very useful things are different methods of payments, automatic messages to registrants, the use of facebook pixel, excellent support.
cons: Cons: It is very difficult to say. For example when we have a free event, we have a hundreds of registrations and hundreds of emails about that. So it will be useful if we could stop that emails but still receive ones for other events.
overall: Overall: Easy organisation of our events, easy registration forms for our customers, easy processing of data. All this leaded to more sales, more income and new opportunities for our business.

title: We use weemss to manage our Innoawards contest since 3 years already.
name: Denitsa M.
pros: Pros: It is a handy tool that helps us organize submission and evaluation steps of our contest. We are able to create variety of nice entry forms for our participants. We can also clone the entire setup of the contest for the next editions that saves us time and efforts as organizers. The platform offers lean but stylish designs to be used as layout for the event web page. We can share access to the platform for co-organizers or invite jury members to vote on-line. All analytics are exportable which helps keeping track record on activities especially for project-based organisations.
cons: Cons: We'd appreciate functionality that makes the contest web page bilingual in order to promote the contest and awardees locally and internationally.

title: Event Management Tool
name: Martin P.
pros:
Pros: Easy to use.

Very professional looking.

All possible options for languages and currencies.

Big range of options for payment methods.

Simple and very cool!

Excellent customer Service!
cons: Cons: Limited ability to customize the design of the landing pages.
overall: Overall: Its one of those tools that makes you WOW while using it. I not only use it but also refer it and now we use it professionally in the company I work.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: No you are great!

title: Great for event managing!
name: Victoria D.
pros: Pros: As an event host and organiser, we need easy-to-use app so our guests could sign up fast and get as much information they need about the event.
cons: Cons: That it's not free for free events. However, I find the fee pretty reasonable since unlike a free software Weemss gives you so many great features.
overall: Overall: Well, first of all all guests sign up really easy, second - we can customize event page (when promoting free event, it's great benefit), and last, but not least, we can keep in touch with everyone, sending useful info, links and questionarees.

title: Interface really friendly
name: Anais B.
pros: Pros: I've been able to compare with other ticketing websites that might be slightly cheaper but the interface was not good compared to Weemss. It's easy to go through the different kind of infos, and easy to take actions without being afraid to do a mistake.
cons: Cons: My country currency wasn't directly supported by Weemss or the gateway payment platform. So payments had to go through conversions before arriving into my bank account. And we were losing a bit for each transactions.
overall: Overall: Once again, the interface makes it really easy for organizers to use and have a overview of their event.

title: Best out there
name: Rob W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use / quick to get started / good customer care (Was - pricing system)
cons: Cons: Not sure how the pricing system will now affect me - depending on price of ticket / free events etc. Time will tell.
overall: Overall: After previously using Eventbrite, Ticket Tailor and a few others for paid for events - I migrated to Weemss. One of its strongest features is offline payments. Weemss has a really clean, easy to use interface and there are various marketing / promo options that are more flexible than other cloud based software. Customer service is exceptionally quick - (chat room or ticketing on the site).

title: Very simple and complete ticketing software
name: Georgi G.
comments: Comments: I organize events for more than 4 years and in last 3 i am using weemss to control processes and sell tickets.

title: Love it - simple and easy to use!
name: Victoria P.
pros: Pros: I thoroughly enjoy the ease of use of the Weemmss System. Without any training, staff can enter event details and make it live.
cons: Cons: The ticket commissions are quite expensive. We find that when using the system, we are paying a significant commission.

title: A great tool that saved us a lot of time and energy.
name: Samuila J.
comments: Comments: WEEMSS is a fascinating tool, which does not require special skills and equipment and is highly user-friendly and reliable. With WEEMSS software we managed to organize our event registration process and tickets sales in a smooth and efficient manner the software managed to support the intensive traffic and overload (the first 100 tickets have been sold in less than half an hour). The ticket sales process is practically fully automated and minimizes the efforts of the event organizers to a minimum. The software provides real-time comprehensive statistics and analytics, which gave us the possibility to adapt our promotional and marketing activities accordingly.

title: Makes Business 1,000x Easier
name: Jessica W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: -Takes nearly all the hassle out of event registration/ticketing

-Easy to use/intuitive website and setup

-Fairly fast customer service help; chat usually available

-Easy to clone events

-Super customizable registrations

-Easy to scan entrants in on the Weemss app

-The most affordable platform I've found
cons:
Cons: -Invoice is in Euros, despite my settings being for USD; drives me a little crazy

Other than that, I don't really have any complaints.
overall: Overall: Just makes life so much easier! I haven't found any software I'd like better for my event platform.

title: Great for Growth
name: Rachael R.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and a great range of registration information could be added. I also appreciated the ability to set sale times to open and close without having to physically log on to "turn the system on/off".
cons: Cons: It would be nice to receive notifications on a basis other than daily.
overall: Overall: My friends and I used this service for a small nonprofit. During ticketed events, we found Weems made it easy for us to set up, test, and track our sales. We were able to pull info directly from the system based upon the demographics/registration info we set up. The system was easy to use and gave us notifications and updates on how we were doing without having to log in. It was great.

title: Easy to use and adaptable piece of software
name: Galin h.
pros: Pros: Easy to use interface
cons: Cons: price
overall:
Overall: It was easy to setup initially apart from the payment gateways. Fr my business clone of events was important so happy this feature was introduced.

Selecting seas and rows was also important aspect.

The fees are a bit high and will be nice to be cheaper.

title: Weemssuper
name: Tereza R.
pros: Pros: Easy set-up, own set-up design of the webpage, flexibility, overal result, zero mistakes, great customer support
cons: Cons: Some features need to be finished to perfection, but any coment I give to the team is considered and they are always trying to find the best solution for me or at least promis to work on it .....
overall: Overall: I did quite a thorough search for a ticket selling app online and I came across 5 different apps but only Weemss had all the features I was looking for. We are using Weemss for one year now, selling concert tickets and I cannot praise it enough - the whole Weemss team is doing a great job, adding new features, investing in the system to make it better every day and their endless personal support with any type of question or problem is out of the way, THANK YOU. Keep up the good work.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Maybe some short tutorial videos on how to set up your event with different features would be helpful for the beginners as the system offers so much but you have to look carefully to find it or you need try it first to see how it works.

title: Wonderful solution for Awards Management
name: John A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Cost, ease of use and Awards Management features.
cons: Cons: Not yet having the ability for the customer to upload their entries during the registration and payment process. It is currently can only be done via a link they receive via email after they have completed the payment.
overall: Overall: We run a monthly photo competition and were looking for a cost effective solution to help automate our processing and judging. This product is the best we could find on the market in both value and performance, their is nothing close to it.

title: Excellent online ticketing system
name: Daniele B.
pros: Pros: easy use, high customization, low fees
cons: Cons: nothing
overall:
Overall: I've tested several ticketing systems for online purchasing during past months and now I can say Weemss is about perfect. It's very easy to use and configure, very good stage design tool for creating all plants for all kind of pub/club/theatre.

I can create every price level for tickets and create coupon codes easily.

High customization for ticket design template (with QR code or barcode), email messages for buyers and onepage website for purchasing online with a seating chart updated in real time.

Easy integration with PayPal Business, very low fees.

Chat support is very good, always finding the right solution.

I'm very happy, it cares every detail!

title: Very easy to use
name: Tia S.
pros:
Pros: Great results with very little effort, whether you have or do not have advanced technical knowledge.

This software combines convenience and nice design.
cons: Cons: I can not think of any. I am very happy with my overall experience with weemss.

title: My experience was smooth and overall perfect.
name: Stanislav A.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, great features, many available options, low price. Overall perfect user support and experience.
cons: Cons: Unavailability to add more then one name to a ticket - as my event tickets are group it will be nice to be able to add more then one name ... or if it exists - to be easier to find as I was unable for the 2 events I organized.

title: We used this for local networking events and our awards submission process - very easy to use.
name: Carly S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It is very easy for people to register and make payments through the software. It is very user-friendly.
cons: Cons: We used this one time for awards entries and registrations. If we could export the entries into word or PDF docs, that would be helpful.

title: Good software for the money
name: Mihail I.
pros: Pros: Fast to setup, easy interface, accepts a lot of payment means. Very good and fast support.
cons:
Cons: Does not support conditional questions (like questions that depend on some criteria, like currently selected ticket category).

Also, when a question is deleted from a form, all the answers that were historically collected for this question in the past are also deleted.
overall:
Overall: Overall satisfied with the product, however certain key features regarding forms and conditional questions are missing (at least when I used the product 6 months ago).

I should say, though, that their support is excellent and they did all they could to help me find a workaround for my problem.

title: smooth user interface
name: Anaïs B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The Interface
cons: Cons: We need an Weems app for smartphone or tablet to be able to scan easily th ticket the D-DAY
overall:
Overall: It's really smooth to navigate into the system, and make it easy to set the details of your event.

The customer support is super reactive, they answer to my questions almost immediately each time.

It's one of the rare ticketing system which accept to set your event in some forgotten currencies :) - Icelandic krona a for my part... +1 for that.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Maybe the online store could be more attractive or it would be great to have different options of template.

title: With weemssI was able to fill my workshop in no time.
name: Janette Z.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: You can setup so many things, like promocodes, marketing tools, analytics and a beatiful event website. The possibilities are huge!
overall: Overall: I get plenty of users, because they can buy tickets with just a click.

title: Affordable tool to publish and manage events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Firstly, I really like the transparent charging model used by Weemss, it was clear what the costs where and the pricing is very competitive.
cons: Cons: I wanted to embed a Youtube video in the description content for my event listings, however this was not possible, at least in December 2017.
overall: Overall: hassle free management of my event ticketing

title: Very useful
name: Olivier D.

pros: Pros: Tools are easily available and easy to use
cons: Cons: Te colors of de layoutand background too dark to me
overall: Overall: This website is very helpul and easy to use. It is a big help organizing an event on a private level
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Add a link to Google Maps

title: Weemss Review
name: Ana Rita M.
pros: Pros: Price and functionalities.
cons: Cons: The user interface could be prettier. Does not offer a smartphone app.
overall: Overall: I'm a student and I'm chair of an association. I need to organize a lot of events for students, like study trips, workshops, talks, and so on. The association members don't need to pay anything, but the other students must pay. Weemss offers a lot of functionalities at a very nice price, which is perfect for us!

title: Very user-friendly software for your events
name: Mira K.
pros: Pros: very user friendly, nice design, public event page, discount options
cons: Cons: free events attract processing fee, no discounts for NGOs.
overall: Overall: We used weemss on multiple occasions and it worked very well without and problems. The automatic event page it produces is very convenient and the payment system works very well. Highly recommended for paid events.

title: Weems helps us gauge our audience as local musicians ahead of time, as opposed to door sales.
name: Wilson M.
pros: Pros: Weems is very easy and practical to set up. The interface is very friendly and helps sort ticket sales a lot easier.
cons: Cons: The only thing my organization was a bit surprised about was the service fee. However we do understand that is very necessary to keep the service running.

title: Great for students
name: Ana Rita M.
comments: Comments: I was looking for a great way to sell free and paid tickets to students from my University when I found Weemss. The service was great and the price is amazing! It is free for free tickets and you only paid a small price for paid tickets. It is the best option for students!

title: Easy, functionality rich and good price plans
name: Simon A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The software itself is very easy to use, the interface is simple, smooth and still has many features and functionalities. The price plans is not to high and what you get is worth it.
cons: Cons: The customization is limited on the landing page which is kind of a small letdown. Other than that I haven't found any major cons at this point yet.

title: Useful and Practical, my first choice
name: Maya T.
pros: Pros: easy to use
cons: Cons: no cons
overall: Overall: We chose Weemss for our national flagship innitiative National Contest Innovative Enterprise of the Year 2016 and National Innovation Forum. Weemss was our first choice as it offered very user-friendly support 24/7 and expertise, wide range of features and the last, but not the least, great opportunity for better communication and outreach. Thank you!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: if it is possible, to be free for NGOs and free events

title: Awesome Service!
name: Kristen B.

cons: Cons: No app!!!!!!!!
overall: Overall: I love Weemss. I have an annual conference and we have used Weemss every year. We look forward to next year and years to come!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: We need an app ASAP!

title: The smarter way to sell more tickets
name: Iva N.
comments: Comments: This software is really cool - easy to use for both planners and event registrants, great support, smart and intuitive! Saves so much time and hustle, clearly developers know what event planners need. My only recommendation is to apply a reserved seating option.

title: Great value ticketing system
name: Lewis O.
pros:
Pros: Easy to use

Good value
cons: Cons: Awards package is less cost-effective than ticketing
overall: Overall: The ticketing system is very easy to set up and is a much more cost-effective option than many competitors. Highly recommended.

title: It's is easy to use but not agil to handle
name: Osman C.
pros:
Pros: Design

Usability

Cons: Mailchimp

Receipt is not at the end of the event
overall:
Overall: Hi,

your Software has a good usability but i cannot implement the link into mailchimp. An error will occured. So the reason, why we are using weemss for our free events are the simple design.

title: Pretty good overall but had some frustrations along the way
name: Claire D.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The interface is relatively easy to use. Some of the category building was tedious and repetitive, some automation would be helpful.
cons: Cons: The exporting experience. It was frustrating when it came to exporting the work. Also, the response time from tech support was difficult with the time difference.
overall: Overall: Ease of use. Low commitment. But expensive.

title: Easy to use and time-saving software
name: Georgi K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use software with a very well-organized dashboard and simple processes of creating and managing our events.
cons: Cons: I cannot find any cons at the moment, I am more than happy with everything.
overall: Overall: Saves a lot of time to manage the whole event, attendees, payments, communication and basicaly everything.

title: Very easy to use!
name: Geoff S.
pros: Pros: I love how it easy it is to use. The setup was easy, and it just works! I like how it tracks registrations so effortlessly
cons: Cons: I wish it had more customizations for both the webpage and the emails that get sent out. I also wish there were more options for fields on the registration form.

title: Good and useful system
name: Alexander Z.
comments: Comments: We are using Weemss for our free partner events. The site give us more visibility and it's easy for our partners and customers to use it.This platform increased our attendance.

title: Easy to Use
name: Jane R.
comments: Comments: The system was so easy to use. We have used WEEMS for all of our events and it was easy to set up the website, registration, and keep track of ticket sales.

title: Great event management solution for your events
name: Juraj H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: Weemss is a great event management solution for those organizing their first event, but it will also impress seasoned event organizers with all the features and tools it has available. The software is easy to use, there are hundreds of features and tools available, there are integrations for loads of online apps - which helps us coordinate everything, and best of all they have warm and friendly customer service.

title: One of the best
name: Alexander N.
pros: Pros: fast, easy, smart
overall: Overall: I use this system twice and I will use it again because they are very easy and fast. I recommend it :)

title: Time saving tool if you manage customer or client events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's very easy to set up and create a new event, manage registrations and also collect ticket fees if you're charging for this event. The interface is easy to pick and find your way around. It only took about 15 minutes of being shown around the platform before I was able to get up and running with it myself. Saved a lot of time and manual effort for small events.
cons: Cons: I can't tell you anything I don't like about using Weemss at the moment as this is the first tool of this kind I've used.

title: Super easy to navigate and create events!
name: Linda B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Weemus gave me the ability to streamline my event sales. I really love how the events display online.
cons: Cons: I'd like to download ticket specifications as a second sheet on the registration spreadsheet. It would make it easier for my administrative team to organize our internal registration forms for the day of the event.
overall: Overall: So far so good. I'm a new administrator and I've felt comfortable with the program. The customer service is exemplary - a very quick response time regarding questions I've had.

title: Versatile, but not flexible
name: Momchil P.
comments: Comments: Weemss has an exceptional up time. Works well for our club, but it's not very flexible with the payments gateways. Options for donations is desperately needed.

title: Excellent solution for any event
name: Ely D.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: custom set up of Auditorium,
cons: Cons: expensive, rate of comission
overall:
Overall: In my opinion weems was the best solution for my event, it offers all the characteristics that I needed for the sale of tickets.

The perfect option is that you can set up an auditorium with your seats.

That was the main characteristic to to use weems. I am happy
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: i d like others sizes for the ticket print, maybe options for personalizar the page and loyout, colors that i need (css configuración)

title: Bit clunky and frustrating to begin, but infinitely improved my life in the long run, once I got it!
name: Natalie B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Weemss makes it so easy to collect payments and all the registration information required. Has saved me hours of admin time.
cons:
Cons: I would like to be able to change the view option on the registration page, ie. choose ticket category rather than date.

I would also like to be able to see the registration details all on one page rather than have to click on each individually. Also an option to email the whole group in one go would be great.
overall: Overall: Time saving.

title: I've had very fluid experiences. Everything has worked as promised!
name: Neale B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use and the flexibility. It is really easy to read and you just fill in each box the way you want. It makes things super efficient.
cons: Cons: I don't have something at this time. Probably being able to change the default dollar value of payments so it saves this for future events.

title: Easy to use software, with great features. I used it for a corporate event.
name: Maria Z.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The best thing is that it is very easy to use and after the event you have a great list of all the people, who attended.
cons: Cons: It charges on certain periods (e.g. once per month). I prefer to be charged once after the end of the event.

title: Very useful
name: Ana Rita M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: All the features and low cost
cons: Cons: Interface
overall: Overall: Very useful when planning events. I specially like the options for tickets. Includes a lot of great features.
